title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 750-1.25 - References

(d) Act
means the Clean

Water Act formerly referred to as the Federal Water Pollution Control Act, 33 U.S.C. §
1251
et seq. - (January 14, 2019) References: * Section 1284 - Limitations and conditions- Additional
determinations; issuance of guidelines; approval by Administrator; system of
charges
* Section 1288(b) -Areawide waste treatment
management-Planning process

(e) All publications referenced in this Part
are available electronically at https://dec.ny.gov/fs/projects/spdes/
(f) All material referenced in this Part is
available for copying and inspection at the New York State Department of

Environmental Conservation, Division of Water at its Central Office location in

Albany County. (g) Ten

States Standards
means Recommended Standards for Wastewater

Facilities, Policies for the Design, Review and Approval of Plans and

Specifications For Wastewater Collection and Treatment Facilities, 2014

Edition. (h) Intermediate

Design Standards
means New York State Design Standards for

Intermediate Sized Wastewater Treatment Systems, 2014

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
750-1.25

Adopted

New

York State Register November 9, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 45, eff. 11/9/2016

Amended

New

York State Register March 22, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 12, eff. 3/22/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
